name: Tamago de Puzzle
overview: Tamago de Puzzle is a puzzle game based on another Sony game Hermie Hopperhead, as the main character and the rest of the game theme and characters are taken from that game. The game itself is like a competitive-type game, where you drop combinations of eggs at two at a time and cause blocks to appear on your opponent's screen. It uses various characters from the Hermie game, including a robotic doppelganger of Hermie. There's also a full story mode with even more animated cutscenes. Game Modes: - Story mode: Your friend has been kidnapped by this strange aliens creatures and they took them to their world, so you have to go after them to rescue her. To do that the player will advance through the game defeating different opponents that can be used in the next stage since the defeated opponent can be used as player characters. - Vs Mode: Play against another human player or the computer. - 1 Player mode: In this mode the player have to make eggs combinations to fill a bar that is on the right side of the screen to win.
